TextView.android:text:
Device Name: The name assigned to this device. You can reset it to the system's default.

 Save to Path: Choose a directory to save your files. You can also reset it to the default path.

 Encryption: Enable or disable AES256 encryption for files being sent.

 Show Warnings: Enable or disable warning messages before sending or receiving files.

 Main Menu: Go back to the main application window. You will be prompted to save changes if any.

 Credits: View credits for the application.
